topics.body:
Well the nsa's budget is in the long run fucked:
So apparently it's come out how the nsa searches for "terrorists"; turns out they spied on five million americans and guess what their criteria for determining potential threats?  Based solely on the exercise of freedom of speech.  What do I mean by this?  If you're a member of a political group and/or have attended a political function or so forth you were targeted by the nsa as a potential threat.

NSA: Where freedom of speech means you're a terrorist.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bcd7ce6368726847b80600#post_53bcd7ce6368726847b80600
How broad a net were they casting? I mean its still unconstitutional if they were targeting, for example, Neo Nazi groups but at least that is somewhat understandable.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bcd7ce6368726847b80600#post_53bcd7ce6368726847b80600
Steve Rogers made areally good point. "I thought the punishment usually came AFTER the crime,"
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bcd84d63687268d1060700#post_53bcd84d63687268d1060700
To the point that they're keeping their mouth shut as much as possible to prevent themselves from winding up in jail broad of a net.

The situation in a nutshell:
"OH FUCK!  They found out we violated the law!"
"Just keep quiet; we have all the evidence classified so long as no one says anything we won't go to prison"


The only reason why they're not in prison is they have the evidence classified, but I would not be surprised if the next president winds up slamming a bunch of people behind bars for their involvement.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bcd7ce6368726847b80600#post_53bcd7ce6368726847b80600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bcd98a63687202e3130000#post_53bcd98a63687202e3130000
We can only hope. This is absolutely disgusting.

Also, minor rant. I realize that somethings have to be classified to preserve lives, and I do not object to that. However if the secret you are hiding getting out will not result in a loss of life then it probably isn't for a very good reason and not only the people you claim to serve, but the world should probably know about it.
